lead_paragraph: New Zealand's Mark Craig has been ruled out of the rest of the test series against India because of a side strain and will be replaced in the squad by fellow off-spinner Jeetan Patel, New Zealand Cricket (NZC) said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Injured Craig Out of India Series, NZ Recall Patel
headline.main: Injured Craig Out of India Series, NZ Recall Patel

snippet: New Zealand's Mark Craig has been ruled out of the rest of the test series against India because of a side strain and will be replaced in the squad by fellow off-spinner Jeetan Patel, New Zealand Cricket (NZC) said on Monday....
